Name: I'm Russia
About the game: CAUTION! ИГРА ЕЩЕ НЕ ЗАКОНЧЕНА НО ПОЛОВИНА УЖЕ ГОТОВА, BUY THE GAME ONLY TO SUPPORT THE DEVELOPER. Welcome to the 1990s in Russia, in the days of dashing bandits. Get ready for a killer action, arcade Shoot’em up with beautiful pixel art. The game tells the story of a guy who ran out of money, and the only way to earn money that he knew about was illegal. Fast action platformer with rolls. By the way, you do not need a computer mouse in this game, so you can throw it out for the duration of the game. There are beautifully hand-drawn pixel graphics and animations. Plunge into the dark Russia of the 90s, inspired by the dump from behind the window and countless panel houses that evoke melancholy and sadness.
